channel.title: Multi-tenant :: Juice's documentation
channel.description: MultiTenant This core feature is useful to verify other core features that we have built because it is developed as a microservice. Itâ€™s integrated with Finbuckle to identity the tenant. We provide multiple choices for tenant data store: File store EFCore store gRPC store We also provide the gRPC API to manage tenant information and tenant settings, so MultiTenant itself is a service with the full implementation of: MultiTenant DBContext UnitOfWork pattern Audit gRPC API DDD/CQRS and Domain Events pattern Integration with event bus Per-tenant configuration/options xUnit helper To use multi-tenant, we must register services with Tenant type
